verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Fighting hamsters from the sky Some will live and some will die Hamsters have nothing to fear The fighting hamsters of Calontir

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Silver tape upon their backs A broadsword is all they lack Fifty hamsters fight a war They won't win without fifty more

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Trained by jumping off a roof Trained in combat tooth to tooth Hamsters fight both far and near The fighting hamsters of Calontir

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Riding high upon our helms Their war cry it overwhelms All opponents become weak At their fearsome squeaky squeak

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Back at home Paval waits His fighting hamster has met its fate He has died while drinking beer The fighting hamsters of Calontir

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Once again its off to war This time we number a dozen more We will fight for those in need so this year it's with Caid

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Fighting hamsters jump from planes Fighting hamsters fall like rain Some will live but most will die Stupid creatures cannot fly
